metadata.name: Fridays At The Park
metadata.description:
Sounds from the Fridays At The Park sessions at Valentine Studios in Los Angeles, CA. This pack is a collection of unique sounds and loops from the Fridays at The Park recording sessions at Valentine Studios in Los Angeles, CA. On Fridays, The Park (Derek Taylor, Ben Schwier, Josh Lippi, and Tim Anderson) bring out special guest artists to write and record a song together from scratch. Utilizing the vintage gear, live rooms and reverbs from the legendary Los Angeles studio, these sounds and loops give an in depth look at the creative process of The Park production team, and allow the collective creation to continue onchain.  
  
Samples included in this Kit:  
 - FATP_Kick_Woo  
 - FATP_Snare_Settling  
 - FATP_Snare_Woo  
 - FATP_Drums_Always High_Bb Major_120
